text: @realDonaldTrump President Trump’s effective leadership helped The nation successfully vanquish the scourge of COVID-19 thanks to Trump’s antiburocractic business approach to engaging and solving real problems. The lay person cannot grasp how GOVT cannot get out of its own bureaucratic way.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
